entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests on Mono_Minijit_Debug-Ubuntu #100715
    9.0.0
  • [ARM] Potential codegen issues on Graviton3 #100705
  • WinDbg doesn't break on first chance managed exceptions with the new EH enabled #100701
    9.0.0
  • Move reflection invocation in coreclr to fully managed way #100696
    9.0.0
  • Stress issues on x86 in JIT/Performance/CodeQuality/V8/Crypto/Crypto/Crypto.dll #100695
  • Stress failure on x86 in JIT/IL_Conformance/Convert/TestConvertFromIntegral/TestConvertFromIntegral.dll #100694
  • System.IO.Ports.SerialPort: Under Linux, closing the port while writing cause a deadlock. #100690
  • Attributes taking object as a parameter have unexpected behavior in AOT #100688
  • Path.ChangeExtension with an empty string behaves differently on Linux and Windows platforms #100687
  • ComInterfaceGenerator.Unit.Tests failed on linux-x64 running interpreter #100683
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add `Utf8JsonReader.TryGetBytesFromBase64(Span<byte> span, out int bytesWritten)` overload #100670
    Future
  • DateTimeOffset - ToLocalTime().DateTime and ToUniversalTime().DateTime return wrong DateTimeKind #100667
  • Cannot install wasi-experimental: Not found in NuGet feeds #100666
  • In certain cases on MacOS, LINQ and IEnumerator::MoveNext() causes stack overflow #100663
  • JIT: Unify `InlinedCallFrame` secret stub arg handling #100662
    Future
  • Utf8Parser.TryParse ignores the provided format for bool #100659

Closed

  • Assertion failed '(arg.GetEarlyNode() == nullptr) != (arg.GetLateNode() == nullptr)' during 'Rationalize IR' #73634
    Future
  • Assertion failed '!"Unknown operator for loop increment"' during 'Optimize Valnum CSEs' #85631
    Future
  • [JitOptRepeat] Assertion failed 'limit->OperGet() == GT_ARR_LENGTH' during 'Optimize Valnum CSEs' #74785
    Future
  • BlobBuilder.LinkSuffix/LinkPrefix need to Free zero length chunks #99266
    9.0.0
  • System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Tests.JSImportTest.MissingImport test fails on CI leg: browser-wasm linux Release LibraryTests_Threading #100421
    9.0.0
  • Is AuthenticationManager obsolete #77459
    9.0.0
  • dotnet nuget sign error: Unknown error (0xc100000d) #100414
    9.0.0
  • Environment.GetEnvironmentVariable("DOTNET_ENVIRONMENT") does not return the environment variable's value entered in the CLI #100674
  • Linq's Count method makes unnecessary enumeration #100677
  • Roadmap to remove obsolete member in BCL? #100679
  • HttpClient Adding Custom External Protocol #100668
  • [release/8.0] va_start/va_end compile time errors with clang 18 + libstdc++ 14 #99825
  • NegotiateStream_StreamToStream_Authentication_EmptyCredentials_Fails fails with The credentials supplied to the package were not recognized #97530
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • GC: Fix survival rates for LOH/POH #100716
    area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix WinDbg first chance exception notification #100714
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix KeyInfoX509Data encoding negative serial numbers #100713
    area-System.Security
  • Fix official build: disable compile-native runtime component libraries for linux-bionic #100712
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Introduce a `BuildAllTestsAsStandalone` environment variable to support some local dev scenarios. #100709
    test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [Ignore] Testing purposes #100708
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix bug in virtual annotation logic for RequiresUnreferencedCode #100707
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Add PDB support for PersistedAssemblyBuilder #100706
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Simplify jitconfigvalues.h #100704
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] chrome crash testing #100702
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser] firefox testing #100697
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add feature switch to disable COM type descriptors #100693
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Add GT_SWIFT_ERROR_RET to represent loading error register upon return #100692
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix Path.ChangeExtension behavior with empty extension (#100687) #100691
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Add missing property to include native libraries for Apple mobile native linker #100689
    area-Infrastructure, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [WIP][mono] Enable runtime tests in AOT modes on linux-arm64 #100685
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Saturating floating point to integer conversions on Arm32 #100682
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Take into account the provided format in Utf8Parser.TryParse for bool #100676
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • [browser] Fix debugger support in WasmAppBuilder #100675
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Microsoft.NET.Sdk.WebAssembly.Pack as library pack #100672
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #100669
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Support SSLKEYLOGFILE in Release builds #100665
    area-System.Net
  • [wasi] Debug missing wasmtime #100664
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • [mono][interp] Minor fixes #100661
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono

Merged

  • Delete odd definition of VolatileLoad/Store #100660
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Special casing `System.Guid` for COM VARIANT marshalling #100377
    area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • BlobBuilder.LinkSuffix/LinkPrefix need to Free zero length chunks #100039
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Use Arcade log publishing instead of our own publishing #100566
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix VS user unhandled exception notification #100673
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Disable default and ambient attribute at runtime with a feature switch #100416
    area-System.ComponentModel
  • Add build option to build Mac .dSYM debug symbol bundles #100617
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Azure Linux 3.0 deps package #100684
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Remove more `ASG` terminlogy from the codebase #86760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Change export name mangling to match expectations #100652
    area-Build-mono
  • Replace FEATURE_EH_FUNCLETS in JIT with runtime switch #99191
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] eslint more autofix #100681
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Remove DAM annotations from enum converter #100347
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] Improvements to startup performance of mono_wasm_get_assembly_exports #99924
    arch-wasm, linkable-framework, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser
  • Add -cross flag to build.ps1 #100678
    area-Infrastructure
  • RSABCrypt: Improve errors with public key only #100658
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • Cleanup NativeAOT math helpers #100375
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [cdac] Add basic cdacreader project #100623
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Azure Linux 3.0 deps package #100656
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [mono][infra] Enable runtime tests in fullAOT LLVM mode on linux-x64 #92057
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Use \e instead of \u001B or \x1B #99659
    NO-MERGE, area-Meta
  • [mono][interp] Reduce false pinning from interp stack #100400
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • JIT: Add support for frozen structs in Swift reverse pinvokes #100344
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ensure Array.CreateInstance over reference types works #100626
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Add timeout for dpkg frontend lock #100653
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: initial profile repair #100456
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement RuntimeHelpers.Box #100561
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Implement RuntimeHelpers.SizeOf #100618
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Wraping both declaration and definition in #ifndef DISABLE_LOGGING. #91042
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Delete `BBF_FAILED_VERIFICATION` and `BBF_FUNCLET_BEG` #93483
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Predicate registers #98258
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NO MERGE][cdac] cdac-build-tool #100650
    NO-MERGE, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [browser] fix emscripten out/err overrides #100630
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Restore StubSecretArg from stack #100428
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use multi-reg load/store for DecodeFromUTF8 #100589
    arch-arm64, area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Fix compact time computation #100599
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [browser][wbt] Debug InnerSendMessageToServerAsync #100182
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • Include versions and checksums in VMR publishing and remove prepare-artifacts.proj #100004
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Switch to iSimdVector and Align WidenAsciiToUtf16 #99982
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • [mono][HybridGlobalization] Fix ShortDatePattern year format to be "yyyy" #99908
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Globalization, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Change all Cookie localized DateTime logic with Universal alternative #100489
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • STJ: Dispose enumerator on exception #100194
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Reloading sources in ConfigurationManager should not dispose IConfigurationSources, only providers #100641
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 9.0.0
  • HttpContent disposal in HttpClientJsonExtensions #100643
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Add metadata for workload automation #100649
    Servicing-approved, area-Workloads
  • Add metadata for workload automation #100648
    Servicing-approved, area-Workloads
  • [browser][MT] improve abort on web worker #100610
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [wasi] Select mono components #100407
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Enable NativeToManaged wrappers to get compiled with LLVM #96910
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [wasm] emscripten bump 3.1.56 #100334
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix Http2 deadlock #100086
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, tenet-reliability, 8.0.x
  • JIT: Rewrite register parameter homing #100572
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for building CoreCLR for iOS/tvOS simulator #98127
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-ios, community-contribution
  • [Test Only] Ignore, just to run some tests. #99339
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, needs-area-label
  • Make it possible to eliminate branches guarded by IsEnum #100399
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [TEST] noop change to see if tests are passing #85694
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Fix SslStreamCertificateContext OCSP test failures #100644
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [RISC-V] Fix assertion for auipc and lui #100578
    community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [WIP][mono][infra] Experiments with runtime-extra-platforms pipeline #100389
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] Use source built emsdk packages for the runtime build #100266
    area-Build-mono
  • Remove non INPLACE_RUNTIME NativeAOT paths, cleanup exceptions #100379
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-05
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Address post-merge tasks #2542
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Reject tailcalls in methods with pinned locals #2541
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET Packages for Ubuntu 24.04 #40025
  • .NET MAUI Not appearing on Visual Studio 2022 Community #40027
  • .NET 8: dotnet new creates a .csproj with <TargetFramework>net6.0</TargetFramework> on Linux / same template works on Windows #40017

Closed

  • dotnet-watch.Tests.dll.1 is timing out sometimes #39993
  • .Net 8 not installable on Ubuntu 24.04 #39907
  • Improve helix test execution to not flag failures with non-zero exit code #39147

PullRequests

Created

  • Set dotnet-watch timeout based on XUnitWorkItemTimeout #40028
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Consider global.json for workload* commands #39644
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Refactor workload set and workload install/update logic #39991
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Installer to SDK merge - Phase 1 #38804
    untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #40002
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #40013
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Static Web Assets] Introduce static web asset endpoints and define compression endpoints #39636
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [Issue #37237 #19650] Dotnet Cli Feature: `dotnet tool update --all` Updating all tools with one command #38996
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Add `--arch` and `--os` options to commands that already support `--runtime` option #37429
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Ingest new props file from installer and use it to auto-include Toolset Compilers package #39701
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-05
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Interceptors #7009

    Working Set

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Pull Diagnostics: Remove direct dependency on EnC, TaskList, Copilot diagnostic sources #72896
  • Make dotnet_diagnostic have priority and add analyzer to report diagnostics if you use value:severity while matching dotnet_diagnostic was defined #72889
    17.11
  • EnC: update MoveNext of deleted async lambda to throw #72887
  • preprocessor add more variables #72886
  • Bug with ref properties and IDE0052 #72884
    Backlog
  • string.Concat behavior difference in recent preview #72883

Closed

  • C# Roslyn "process terminated" NRE critical failure, with repro #72862
    17.11
  • Dynamic variables fail to interpolate when using a custom InterpolatedStringHandler #72606
    17.11
  • Assertion in `BindCollectionInitializerElementAddMethod` in ref struct error scenario #72762
    17.11
  • Enum values are not checked by IDE1006 (naming rules) #72574
  • Error running code action with `EnforceCodeStyleInBuild` in new Roslyn with .NET8 SDK #72879
  • Extensions with constrained generic types are not recommended when invoked on a generic method parameter #72457
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove ISyntaxFacts from snippet work #72897
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update VS telemetry for devkit #72894
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use semantics to check for readonly struct #72893
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Invocations statically bound in presence of dynamic arguments should have `dynamic` result if their dynamic binding succeeded in C# 12 #72885
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Enforce not using internal APIs in codestyle #72882
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Use collection expression in place of empty-enumerable #72895
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Make snippet generation strongly typed. #72892
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Disallow dynamic calls on ref struct receivers #72674
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Remove diagnostic option no longer read in product code. #72891
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add support for AIOSP to search only the current document or current project. #72293
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add skipped test for https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/issues/72887 #72888
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Semantic snippets: Implement `do` snippet #72842
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Remove eventing from ExternalErrorDiagnosticUpdateSource #72774
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Ensure taggers that compute frozen partial data eventually move to a 'correct' final state. #72878
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Provide option to only update source-generators on special events (like a build) #72494
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add helper for common pattern when creating solutions. #72881
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Recommend extensions with matching constraints when the extension type is the generic type parameter #72853
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Report diagnostic when lambda binding count exceeds threshold #72823
  • Allow language specific handlers to use their own types for serialization #72230
  • Edit and continue diagnostic source #72787
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Remove the IBuildOnlyDiagnosticService #72447
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update segmented collections from v5.0.2 reference sources to v8.0.3 #72687
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Allow ref-like locals in iterators and async methods #72664
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async, 17.11
  • Add support for checksum-based interceptors #72814
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Enhance Navigation works horribly, I would suggest drop it all and re do it again. #54982
  • Perf regression: plainTextWithFilter #54981
  • Perf improvement: json, mapaction #54980
  • ASP.NET Core publishes all the dll dependenies under the root directory #54979
  • Minimal APIs and controllers treat header arrays differently #54978
  • Support Token Credential Utilities for .http Files #54977
  • Should IHtmlAsyncContent.WriteToAsync use a custom encoder? #54976
  • JwtSecurityToken does not parse the payload claims correctly. Claims are missing in the Payload array. #54975
  • How to inject multiple Background services in Net8? #54972
  • How set Cookie and Session Timeout Based on Logged In User #54966
  • Setting Microsoft-related logs messages to "Information" or lower in appsetting.json causing an ASP.NET web application to stop serving page. Kestrel Web Server #54964
  • Random NullReferenceException on HttpContext.User Kestrel/Outofprocess #54962
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, plaintext #54961
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #54960
  • Issue with 1Password Extension Causing High CPU Usage in Blazor WebAssembly Application with OIDC Authentication #54959
  • How to res the username and pass #54957

Closed

  • Blazor Localization does not work with InteractiveServer #53707
  • Continuous browser reloading while navigating within AuthorizeView razor page #52686
  • Use SearchValues throughout dotnet/aspnetcore #46484
    .NET 9 Planning
  • API Proposal: Microsoft.Extensions.ServiceDiscovery #53715
  • restore.cmd not working #54938
  • Net7 regression: Kestrel HttpRequestHeaders doesn't enumerate "Content-Length" unless there's another known header also present. #54557
  • Issue while converting .net 6 to .net 8 for IHttpContextAccessor. #54958
  • Incorrect documentation for Html.HiddenFor: `Html.HiddenFor` will never use `value` property from `htmlAttributes` to assign value #49415
    Backlog
  • MSAL on Blazor WebAssembly refresh token expiration invalid_grant regression #48264
  • Microsoft.IdentityModel.Protocols.OpenIdConnect OpenIdConnectConfigurationSerializer Read() method does not parse UseInfoEndpoint correctly #54951
  • X509SecurityKey could support ECDSA backed Certificates for JsonWebToken signing #54963
  • Blazor Web App with Microsoft Entra External ID Exhibits Inconsistent Unauthorized Access Behavior #52856
  • Containerizing .NET 8 Blazor WASM breaks after update from .NET 6 #54618
  • Issue with Failed to load resource: net::ERR_HTTP2_PROTOCOL_ERROR #54559
  • Unhandled exception: When using popup components on an InteractiveServer page and navigating to any other InteractiveServer page #54731
  • Cannot create a new Blazor(Razor Component) inside a sub folder. ( this works in .NET 8) #54726
  • Virtualize component doesn't work with hidden elements #54741

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] Skip SpotBugs for now #54986
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Skip SpotBugs for now #54985
    area-infrastructure
  • [Blazor/Web.JS] Add Circuit Handler Notification on Circuit Disconnect #54973
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Include a warning about port spoofing in xml #54971
    community-contribution, area-networking, area-routing
  • Improve documentation for CookiePolicyMiddleware and CookieOptions #54968
    community-contribution, area-middleware, 9.0-preview4

Merged

  • Quarantine CanLaunchPhotinoWebViewAndClickButton #54937
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview4
  • Use SearchValues throughout dotnet/aspnetcore (part 3) #54878
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 9.0-preview4
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `eff443c` to `0af9766` #54969
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4
  • [release/8.0] Skip SpotBugs for now #54952
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.5
  • Include ContentLength when enumerating HttpHeaders #54760
    area-networking, 9.0-preview4
  • Docs: changed to align with function behaviour. #54965
    area-mvc, community-contribution, area-ui-rendering, 9.0-preview4
  • Update Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp testing deps #54947
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4

Updated

  • Add APIs for OpenAPI document transformers #54935
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Static pages amid global interactivity #54948
    area-blazor
  • Add ShortCircuitAttribute #52571
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Quarantine CanResetSharedKey #54841
    area-identity, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add custom message to NavigationException #54862
    area-blazor, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Image loading error #21670
  • iOS Release can't build with CosmosDB #21668
  • Style applied to a wrong element throws exception in Release but not in Debug #21661
  • Blank Space coming in top of ListView in iOS #21659
  • Cannot Build net8.0-ios via msbuild or Paired Mac #21657
  • UseInterpreter is set in any project referencing a class library that references MAUI #21653

Closed

  • In 8.0.7, Image.ToPlatform(Image.Handler.MauiContext) now gives 'Microsoft.Maui.Platform.WrapperView' rather than the actual platform types (UIImageView/ImageView/Image) #21656
  • [iOS, Blazor] `AllowInlineMediaPlayback` should be true by default #16207
    Backlog
  • NavigationPage.SetTitleIconImageSource Cases crash on iOS #21518
  • Dragging random stuffs inside webview shows weird looking icon #15969
  • BlazorWebView.HostPage does not support URI pack notation #15373
  • Blazor hybrid JS initializers dont work #15201
  • MAUI BlazorWebView does not support transparent page background in iOS #14407
  • BlazorWebView/WebView2 Transparent background not transparent on Windows #14185
  • MAUI Blazor `html, body, #app { height: 100%; }` works properly on Windows but doesn't work properly on macOS #11508
  • Dock > Fill dropdown values missing for a BlazorWebView control #12006
  • Blazor Hybrid Relative Path Handling #10898
  • MAUI Blazor App OnBackPressed not firing after launching Modal XAML Window from Blazor #11105
  • Drag-and-drop problem #10701
  • MAUI Blazor App allow enabling WebGPU on Android/iOS/Mac #10395
  • Allow mixed-content in MauiBlazorWebView #10141
  • Updating the ItemsLayout in CollectionView on Android with ItemSizingStrategy set to MeasureFirstItem messes up Layout #21655
  • MAUI Android build crashes when app is reopened from background. It throws the exception: 'Window was already created.' #18692
    .NET 8 SR4
  • [UITEST] ScrollView Enable Legacy Tests #19051
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • AbsoluteLayout initialized in code-behind does not update view layout on Android #20845
  • Scale transform seems relative instead of absolute? #21457
  • deployment errors #21652
  • Editor works perfectly in Android but generates an error in iOS #21650
  • Memory Leak on back and Fro navigation on page where Custom control and complex View Page #21404

PullRequests

Created

  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #21667
  • [net9.0] Merge net9.0 to main #21666
  • Set Views used for CarouselView to Match Parent #21662
  • Update NavigatedFromEventArgs.cs #21658
    community ✨
  • Add unit test for button images in layouts #21651
    area/testing, community ✨

Merged

  • IndicatorView IndicatorTemplate Binding #19004
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨, stale
  • Making sure FindMauiContext fallbacks to default for the title icon i… #21519
    community ✨
  • Add better exception if user opens second activity #21492
  • Don't worry about the size of the text #21628
  • [Testing] Add legacy ScrollView UITests #19054
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, layout-scrollview, testing-legacy-ui-tests

Updated

  • [iOS] Implemented PrefersHomeIndicatorAutoHidden, PrefersStatusBarHidden and PreferredStatusBarUpdateAnimation Platform Specifics #20069

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Invalid SQL is produced from LINQ Query with Convert.ToString() in join condition #33481

Closed

  • Is it possible to ignore an entire folder of partial class files? #33467
  • CosmosDB with RBAC doesn't work #32197
    9.0.0-preview4
  • Fully support inline List (and other non-array) collections as inline collection query roots #32413
    9.0.0-preview4

PullRequests

Merged

  • Use CreateContainerIfNotExistsAsync on the Cosmos SDK to be compatible with RBAC #33473
  • List<T> as inline collections implementation. #33476
  • Add the VMR configuration file #33480
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • Introduce liftable constants to shaper to prepare for precompilation #33351

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-05
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Add 1ES PT baseline for VMR #19336
  • [VMR] Light up Alpine lanes #19332
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #19331
  • Update-eol-versions-8.0.1xx #19318

Merged

  • Use ReferenceOnlyRepoArtifacts in more places instead of hardcoding SBRP #19315
  • Add missing MSFT vs UB SDK baselines and update outdated baselines #19328
  • Copy symbols to intermediates #19303
  • Rewrite testhost.json #19320
  • Rename artifacts baseline #19329
  • Remove obsolete ApplicationInsights dependency #19325
  • [VMR] Correctly pass TargetArchitecture in emsdk.proj #19324
  • Update artifacts baseline #19308
  • [VMR] Pass target architecture on Windows #19321
  • Run CodeQL in VMR's SDL stage #19322
  • Allow using Traversal and NoTargets SDK in VMR orchestrator #19319
  • Add win-x86 to known ILCompiler and NativeAOT runtime packs #19166

Updated

  • Add Unified Build produced NuGet package validation against official build #19304
  • Installer updates (Merge to SDK Changeset) #17959
  • Update to the shipping version of MSBuild #19041
  • Make SmokeTests use repo infrastructure #19290
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #19297
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #19294
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #19295
  • Add remaining PGO legs for the VMR #19311
  • Enable scenario test execution in VMR build #19222
